actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5649 with 1 hour 0 of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI are waived. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments. After passage of H.R. 5649, it shall be in order to take from the Speaker's table the bill S. 916 and to consider said bill in the House. It shall then be in order to move to strike out all after the enacting clause of the Senate bill and to insert in lieu thereof the provisions of H.R. 5649 as passed by the House. It shall them be in order to move to insist on the House amendment to S. 916 and
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-765, by Mr. Frost.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 167.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5649) National Aeronautics and Space Administration Multiyear Authorization Act of 1990.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5649 (National Aeronautics and Space Administration funding).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5649) National Aeronautics and Space Administration Multiyear Authorization Act of 1990.
